attributes.action: Declare a national emergency and call an election.
attributes.additional_details:
Individuals and businesses cannot bear any more uncertainty. 
Procrastination and subversion is harming our Union and impacting on the livelihoods of millions. 

We need a government with a mandate to be decisive.
attributes.background:
Brexit uncertainty and faith in democracy is at an all time low. 
No party has a majority in Parliament and things are now gridlocked. 
Out reputation as a Democratic nation and the sovereignty of the Crown is at stake.

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about the UK leaving the EU but we're not sure what you want to happen in relation to Brexit by calling a national emergency. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like to happen.

There's already a petition about a general election which you might like to sign. You're more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264215
